message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $150. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled value and satisfaction. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. However, $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in purchasing, but I'd be willing to pay $100 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your interest, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway at $125 for our premium product. This price reflects the quality and value we believe it offers. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  While I value the product, $125 is still a bit high for me. I'm prepared to pay $115. This is my final offer, as I'm comfortable paying John's price if we can't come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering the value of our product, I am willing to offer it to you for $120. This is my final offer, reflecting the product's worth and acknowledging your willingness to negotiate. I hope you find this satisfactory.
